00088 /*
00089  * Generic DES driver interface
00090  * Keep this file hardware independent!
00091  * Copyright (c) 1986 by Sun Microsystems, Inc.
00092  */
00093 
00094 #define DES_MAXLEN  65536   /* maximum # of bytes to encrypt  */
00095 #define DES_QUICKLEN    16  /* maximum # of bytes to encrypt quickly */
00096 
00097 #ifdef HEADER_DES_H
00098 #undef ENCRYPT
00099 #undef DECRYPT
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 enum desdir { ENCRYPT, DECRYPT };
00103 enum desmode { CBC, ECB };
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * parameters to ioctl call
00107  */
00108 struct desparams {
00109     unsigned char des_key[8];   /* key (with low bit parity) */
00110     enum desdir des_dir;    /* direction */
00111     enum desmode des_mode;  /* mode */
00112     unsigned char des_ivec[8];  /* input vector */
00113     unsigned des_len;   /* number of bytes to crypt */
00114     union {
00115         unsigned char UDES_data[DES_QUICKLEN];
00116         unsigned char *UDES_buf;
00117     } UDES;
00118 #   define des_data UDES.UDES_data  /* direct data here if quick */
00119 #   define des_buf  UDES.UDES_buf   /* otherwise, pointer to data */
00120 };
00121 
00122 /*
00123  * Encrypt an arbitrary sized buffer
00124  */
00125 #define DESIOCBLOCK _IOWR(d, 6, struct desparams)
00126 
00127 /* 
00128  * Encrypt of small amount of data, quickly
00129  */
00130 #define DESIOCQUICK _IOWR(d, 7, struct desparams) 
00131
